objects.text:
• Sleek matte black design with
   decorative utensil cutouts
• 2-piece set includes utensil holder
   and silverware caddy
• Durable metal construction with
   rust-resistant coating

product_details.name: Premium Kitchen Utensil Organizer Set - Modern Black Collection
product_details.description:
• Sleek matte black design with decorative utensil cutouts and perforated pattern
• 2-piece set includes large utensil holder and matching silverware caddy
• Durable metal construction with rust-resistant coating
• Perfect height for storing cooking tools and eating utensils
• Stylish wooden handle accents on utensils for enhanced durability
• Space-saving circular design fits perfectly on countertops
• Easy to clean and dishwasher safe
• Versatile storage solution for kitchen tools and flatware
• Modern minimalist aesthetic complements any kitchen décor
• Ergonomically designed for easy access to all utensils

banner_details:
This banner features a two-column layout with a clean and modern aesthetic, promoting a kitchen utensil organizer. On the left, the layout showcases a prominent stacked header composed of three bold text lines (id: "heading") in uppercase black. Below this, a contrasting gold-toned subheading (id: "subheading") adds a touch of elegance. Three concise bullet points (id: "description") follow, summarizing product features in a minimalist sans-serif font. A bold price tag (id: "price") grabs attention underneath, accompanied by a call-to-action button (id: "cta" and "cta_background") labeled in white on a black background. On the right side, a high-quality product image (id: "product_image") displays the utensils clearly, enhancing visual interest against a light beige and ivory background split by a dotted vertical divider.

**Color Palette:**
- Ivory #F5F3EE
- Warm Light Gray #ECEAE5
- Charcoal Black #222222
- Dusty Beige (Gold Accent) #BCA388
- Soft Brownish Gray #D9D1C7
- White #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern aesthetic with a dominant color palette combining muted tones and polished finishes. The utensils are mainly charcoal gray (#3A3F41) with matte finishes, complemented by light bamboo wood handles (#D8B07E), adding warmth and contrast. The holders are black (#121212), punctuated with metallic silver cut-outs and utensils (#C0C0C0), which reflect light and give a premium, contemporary look. The blend of matte and metallic finishes creates a visually balanced effect, enhancing product focus. For an advertisement banner, use this palette: Charcoal Gray (#3A3F41), Bamboo Tan (#D8B07E), Black (#121212), and Silver (#C0C0C0) for an elegant, minimal appeal.
